name: Old Boy
description:
Old Boy, your coffee is ready! Old Boy?

Old Boy is sleeping, and at this moment he's dreaming that he's a young boy with incredible skills of being young! Yes, a young boy in full vigor, and believe it or not, he knows how to run and jump, and he even does it with some mastery.



  • Enjoy your vigor in this simple game, focused on precision challenges.
  • A challenging dream with 40 screens that can frustrate you, but it's satisfying to reach the end.
  • Your greatest reward will simply be achieving it, because success is just one step after another.
  • There are no checkpoints! Either you're good and reach the end, or you make a mistake and go back to the beginning of the screen, but this time better than before. Believe me, winning after making a few mistakes is very satisfying, just like in real life.

This game has been designed to have responsive controls and fluid gameplay, with quick transitions so you don't lose focus. Your main concern will be hitting the platforms and avoiding the dangers between them. If you're an experienced player, it shouldn't take more than 20 minutes to complete the levels, but if you're not that experienced, the time is unpredictable, 30, 40, 50 minutes... I don't know, you tell me when you succeed.



Dev's Note: This is the first commercial game from this independent game studio, and if you like what you're going to play here, imagine what's coming next!

Thank you for playing,
Fluid Control Games.
